mapper.insert: insert into member (no, id, pw, name, dep_no, rank_no, email, image, reg_date) values (seq_member.nextval, #{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{dep_no}, #{rank_no}, #{email}, #{fileName}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select m.no, m.id, m.pw, m.name, d.name as dep_name, r.name as rank_name, m.email, m.image as fileName, to_char(to_date(reg_date), 'yyyy.MM.dd') as reg_date from member m inner join department d on m.dep_no = d.no inner join rank r on m.rank_no = r.no order by 1 desc

select no, id, pw, name, dep_no, dep_code, dep_name, rank_no, rank_code, rank_name, email, filename, reg_date from(select m.no, m.id, m.pw, m.name, d.no dep_no, d.code dep_code, d.name as dep_name, r.no rank_no, r.code rank_code, r.name as rank_name, m.email, m.image as fileName, to_char(to_date(reg_date), 'yyyy.MM.dd') as reg_date from member m inner join department d on m.dep_no = d.no inner join rank r on m.rank_no = r.no where m.no = #{no})
select count(*) from member where id = #{id} and pw = #{pw}

select count(*) from( select rownum rn, no, id, pw, name, dep_name, rank_name, email, image, reg_date from (select m.no, m.id, m.pw, m.name, m.dep dep_name, r.name rank_name, m.email, m.image, m.reg_date from( select m.no, m.id, m.pw, m.name, d.name dep, m.rank_no, m.email, m.image, m.reg_date from member m inner join department d on m.dep_no = d.no ) m inner join rank r on m.rank_no = r.no) ) where no > 0
and dep_name like '%' || #{cri.keyword} || '%' and rank_name like '%' || #{cri.keyword} || '%' and name like '%' || #{cri.keyword} || '%'
